content: {"name": "Cass Community Social Services", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Various social services are offered, including free food, Christmas and Thanksgiving meals, gifts, and referrals to government programs and local charities.", "email": "", "url": "https://casscommunity.org/services/food-services/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "11745 Rosa Parks Boulevard", "address_2": null, "city": "Dexter Linwood", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48206", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3865679, "longitude": -83.10684619999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 883-2277", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
